title: Best of The Herd: 03/19/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/19/2019
description:
Colin thinks the Lakers are doing a lot of damage control with rumors about Doc Rivers' interest in coaching their team leaking at the right time.  He predicts the record for all 32 NFL teams including some NFC powers taking big steps back.  Plus, former NBA all-star and number 1 pick Kenyon Martin comes in studio to defend Russell Westbrook and his actions that led to a suspension.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
